summary: A film about an unfinished film which portrays the people behind and before the camera in the Warsaw Ghetto, exposing the extent of the cinematic manipulation forever changing the way we look at historic images.
cast: Hanna Avrutzki|Luba Gewisser|Jurek Plonski|Aliza Vitis-Shomron|Shula Zeder|Janusz Hamerszmit|Eliezer Niborski|Alexander Senderovich|Mendy Cahan|Chava Alberstein|Gera Sandler|Axel Thielmann|Rona Kenan|RÃ¼diger Vogler|Alexander Beyer
title: Shtikat haarchion
